author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Happy Black Friday, everyone! Dmitry, our co-founder and a CNCF Ambassador, is here to talk about lemons 🍋 oh wait… He’s to inform you that, starting next Monday, Linux Foundation Education will offer the best possible discounts on all its certifications and learning courses — obviously, including those related to Kubernetes and other great Cloud Native technologies. Don’t miss this opportunity during CyberWeek, from December 1st through 9th! 🙌

Get the details: https://training.linuxfoundation.org/
title: A message on Cyber Week from CNCF Ambassador Dmitry Shurupov, Co-Founder, Palark GmbH

author: The Linux Foundation
description:
OpenSearch is changing fast — and in this conversation, we get a front-row look at where it’s really heading. Bianca Lewis, Executive Director of the OpenSearch Software Foundation, joined me at KubeCon to talk about the project’s transformation into a fully vendor-neutral open source platform. She also shared how the community is approaching AI, vector search, Observability and what the 3.x release signals for scale, performance and enterprise adoption.

If you want to understand where search, data and Observability platforms are going — this is the interview for you.

Learn more: https://opensearch.org
Read the full story: ww.tfir.io
Become a Client/Sponsor: https://tfir.io/tfir-video-vip/

#OpenSearch #OpenSource #Observability #SearchTechnology #AI #VectorSearch #EnterpriseSearch #LinuxFoundation #KubeCon #CloudNative
title: Why OpenSearch Is Becoming the Backbone of AI & Observability | Bianca Lewis, OSSF
